image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot inside a modern manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of maintenance technicians (men and women) wearing hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests are gathered around a large industrial motor. One technician is holding a tablet (back of device visible only) pointing it toward the machine, implying an augmented reality or scanning function. The background shows a clean, bustling factory floor with blurred automated machinery and soft, cool industrial lighting. No text or words should be visible in the image. The atmosphere is professional, high-tech, and collaborative.
